column4: Is there a way to install multiple fonts at once? I backed up some of my old fonts from my last computer and wanted to install some of them (in mass) there's about 153 fonts. I know how to install them individually (i.e. double click-->click 'install') but how to do it all at once? Like in Microsoft Windows you just right click on all the selected fonts and choose 'install fonts'.
just drag and drop them to ~/.fonts
